IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: To manage the City of San Jose's convention and cultural facilities and promote tourism.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION'S MISSION IS TO ENSURE THAT SAN JOSE'S CONVENTION CENTER AND CULTURAL FACIILITIES ARE EFFECTIVELY MANAGED TO REDUCE COSTS, IMPROVE THE LOCAL ECONOMY, AND ADD VALUE FOR OUR CUSTOMERS, RESIDENTS, WORKERS, AND BUSINESSES WITHIN THE CITY OF SAN JOSE.
IRS990.Desc: The Organization operates and manages the San Jose convention center and cultural facilities including the city national civic center, California Theatre, Center for the Performing arts, Montgomery Theater, South Hall and Parkside Hall.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION APPLIES THE PROVISIONS SET FORTH IN FASB ASC TOPIC 740, INCOME TAXES, TO ACCOUNT FOR THE UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES. THE ORGANIZATION ASSESSED ALL INCOME TAX POSITIONS TAKEN WHERE THE STATUTE OF LIMITATIONS REMAINS OPEN. THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES ITS TAX FILING POSITIONS WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON TAX EXAMINATIONS THEREFORE, NO LIABILITY FOR UNRECOGNIZED INCOME TAX BENEFITS HAS BEEN RECORDED THROUGH THE END OF THE CURRENT FISCAL YEAR. THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT ANTICIPATE ANY SIGNIFICANT INCREASES OR DECREASES TO UNRECOGNIZED INCOME TAX BENEFITS DURING THE NEXT TWELVE MONTHS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization have active members who are involved with the organization.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 7a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization have members who may elect members of the governing board by majority vote.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 7b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Certain decisions of the governing board are subject to approval of the members.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF FORM 990 IS REVIEWED PRIOR TO FILING BY THE CFO AND OTHER MANAGEMENT PERSONNEL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS INCLUDED IN THE EMPLOYEE HANDBOOK. THE POLICY IS SIGNED ON AN ANNUAL BASIS AND IS INCLUDED AS A REMINDER AT THE MONTHLY MEETING

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE REVIEWS AND DETERMINES THE COMPENSATION OF MANAGEMENT AND KEY EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The governing docs, policies, and financial statements are available to the public upon request.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: An activity of the City Of San Jose
